system.description:
When you pierce the mask of someone you believe will shape the future, roll + Savior instead of + Mundane.

When you pierce someone’s mask to see the person beneath, roll + Savior.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: Mark Potential and the GM makes a move.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value:
